name: Tearstone: Thieves of the Heart
description:
Dragons Eye Studio brings you into the mythical world of Tearstone with the mind-bending adventure, Tearstone: Thieves of the Heart!

The Heart of Tearstone has gone missing! Ten years have passed since your last journey into this strange world, and with the Heart’s disappearance, powerful sorcery has taken hold! With few clues to follow, your quirky troop of friends has summoned you to help solve a growing mystery and save the inhabitants of Tearstone!
Who took the Heart? What secrets does it contain? … And is this airship actually safe?
There’s only one way to find out! Climb aboard and hold on tight for a challenging and enchanting Adventure game for the ages!



Features
• Original mini-games and puzzles
• Most unique hidden-object scenes
• Beautiful, hand-painted locations
• Intriguing characters



This is a special Collector's Edition release full of exclusive extras:
• Challenge yourself even more with an incredible Bonus Chapter: Portal Todd!
• 7 Cards of Destiny - secret Bonus Game!
• An integrated strategy guide.
• Dozens of achievements and collectibles!
• Wallpapers, concept art, soundtracks and movies.
• Replay favorite mini-games and puzzles!
